title: Bedrock network - Script ran successfully but after 2 seconds the Blockchain stops
body:
<!--
Need help?
Refer to our contributing guidelines for additional information about making a good issue:
https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/.github/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md
-->

**Describe the bug**
I can`t get the devnet running. The Blockchain stops after few seconds

**To Reproduce**

After installing Go, Node.js, Pnpm, Foundry, Make, Docker, Docker Compose


Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. sudo su
2. cd into packages/contracts-bedrocks
3. pnpm i 
4. pnpm build
5. cd into root of monorepo
6. make install-geth
7. make cannon-prestate
8. make devnet-allocs

**CMD output**
